bugprone-copy-constructor-mutates-argume.description:
Description

Finds assignments to the copied object and its direct or indirect members
in copy constructors and copy assignment operators.

This check corresponds to the CERT C Coding Standard rule
OOP58-CPP. Copy operations must not mutate the source object
.
bugprone-copy-constructor-mutates-argume.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
